website_summaries.verdict: There’s only one thing cooler than building the legendary Batmobile from scratch, and that’s taking it for a spin yourself.
pros: Drive the completed Batmobile with an app via Bluetooth smartphone or tablet

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for the Bluetooth hub and motors alone
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth hub and two motors alone cost $100 if bought separately from LEGO, so we thought it was well worth it to buy this set for the same price. The app was good, but was batman specific, so we also bought a bluetooth remote control directly from LEGO (part 88010) for $22 so the HUB and motors can be used without the app as well. My son (age 13) has spent more time building his own remote control creations than playing with the original build.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks super cool
customer_reviews.text: My 14yr old loves this car. He assembled in 30 minutes (He loves LEGO). I even got a chance to control it from his phone. One of the options to control we really don’t understand but the other way is easy to use. I see it zoom through the living room or game room do good speed but make sure no animal is near cause our dog tried to catch it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Sarellana

customer_reviews.title: Grossly Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for what it is. Doesn’t sync to the phone that well and falls apart anytime it hits anything. Better off getting a remote control car.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6yrs old son. It looks good but hard to assembly and keep falling apart...
customer_reviews.author: Nelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool LEGO set, amazon price better than in store!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a REALLY cool LEGO set! Once built, the driving settings are like that of a traditional r/c car. It’s very responsive and looks cool. My kids modified the build after a few days and it still drives well. It takes some time to build, but it’s totally worth it. I absolutely love the design and color scheme of this car. It’s hot, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Sterling Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves batman so auto win. You get the app controlled peices with this set to drive it like a remote controll car through an app which alone is 100$. Was not to hard to put together and works great. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Poley

customer_reviews.title: Great for building
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo put it together by himself. Downside is he needs the app on my phone or iPad in order to steer it. Also not great for outside use. Doesn’t go super fast. But my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KY Family G

customer_reviews.title: Innovative toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It was easy to build and stand up to the occasional collision with a wall or two! We had the wrong app at first but once we found the right one, super easy!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with defective motor; unable to move
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and after assembly discovered one of the motors did not have enough power to move the car. Lego are known for their exceptional quality so this is a real shock and let down, score of 1 to reflect a defective product but I will update with how the process of replacing the motor goes. Also the app sucks, should include a basic remote of some sort instead of an app that doesn't work well on older phones so I don't have to sacrifice my phone for play time.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Remote app doesn't work, LEGO support is no help.
customer_reviews.text: Remote doesn't work. LEGO never replied to my support emails. The whole thing won't roll on it's own. USELESS.
customer_reviews.author: AiXeLsyD13

customer_reviews.title: Batmobile never looked better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday. He loves legos and had so much fun building this one! He can control it with his phone and loves torturing our dog with racing this car through the house...
customer_reviews.author: De’Borah Kucera

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for 7year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7yr old son for Christmas. He loves it! Was easy enough for him to follow directions and only took about an hour or two to build. App was easy to find and use. The app also works with other LEGO Bluetooth compatible kits such as the Disney train which is on our wish list.
customer_reviews.author: SarahS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the techie Lego-Master
customer_reviews.text: Grandson requested for Christmas. I was hesitant because of reviews. Hes 8, he loved putting it together and he paired it with his new tablet I got him and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommak

customer_reviews.title: Gift for godson
customer_reviews.text: He loved it so much he spent almost his entire day building it! Works great and was everything he imagined it would be
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Build your own remote control car... plus hack something new when it gets boring!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMegaBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted
customer_reviews.text: If the person intent on operating the device has their own phone i would increase the rating by 1 star but this purchase was in pieces by day two cuz i don't share my phone w/ my kids
customer_reviews.author: Ryansmeg

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old made it in an hour or 2, loaded the app on his mini iPad and it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: ErinV

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. My son and I had fun putting it together
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Super cool toy.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my boys entertained while building and then they showed it off proud while driving it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMM

customer_reviews.title: Very breakable
customer_reviews.text: My issue with this is that unless you glue parts together, it breaks every time it even bumps into something. If it were $30 that’d be a different story but for $100 it’s too fragile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO because you build it and then it doesn’t just sit on a shelf
customer_reviews.text: My son saved up for this and has loved it.
customer_reviews.author: ls

customer_reviews.title: Anticipation is killing me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back. Haven’t opened it yet but looking forward to opening it soon. The anticipation of opening it and just to set it up one day is the reason why I am giving this a five star. Will update later once I open it and build it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas L

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved her remote control super hero car. She loves to put things together. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun LEGO remote control
customer_reviews.text: This lego is a great gift idea!!!! Remote control car for a great price! Both of my boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for fans of Lego Batman. Had a hard concealing the bluetooth "engine" cords. The app is pretty basic. The minifigure is superbly painted. Overall, I do recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Media Guy

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old son built it, and it is cool! It’s much faster than I was expecting, and the app is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10 year old boys
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson loved this and found it challenging to build
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Looks great could use a better blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and is fun to play with. Sometimes the Bluetooth gets a little funky which is my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: John C. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son and he loves it! It was easy for him to put together and he was so proud of himself. He plays with it for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to connect to my phone at first but after that it was awesome
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harter

customer_reviews.title: Is that used? That is my boys Christmas gift. Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The Manuel is torn and broken when my kid opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: YLW

customer_reviews.title: What a fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was purchased as a gift for a 9 year old. He had no trouble putting it together, or figuring out the controls. Very fun to play with and torture the cat!
customer_reviews.author: James Bucholtz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kids with a phone
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing! My son got it for Christmas he built it well and loves being able control it with via phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mom with boys

customer_reviews.title: Goes fast and easy to control.
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy. Put it together and control with phone. 12 year old grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Van Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to learn coding
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for kids, takes some time to put together but it’s simple to code and fun for kids. Great idea
customer_reviews.author: Federico Becerra C.

product_meta.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes App-controlled Batmobile 76112 Remote Control (rcs) Batman Car, Best-Seller Building Kit and Toy for Boys (321 Piece)
product_meta.description: Kids can speed to Gotham City crime scenes with the motorized LEGO DC Super Heroes 76112 app-controlled Batmobile. This cool vehicle features 2 motors powered by a Bluetooth-controlled battery hub, an opening minifigure cockpit, 4-wheel drive and 2 dual stud shooters. Simply download the app to control the vehicle from your smartphone or tablet. This set also includes a Batman minifigure. This is a popular gift for boys and girls.
feature_bullets: This LEGO Batmobile is built with 321 pieces and includes a Batman minifigure, and a Blue-tooth controlled hub which enables the builder to drive, control, and even do wheelies with their smart device.

The fast, remote-controlled Batmobile has 4-wheel drive and 2 dual stud shooters and an opening cockpit for a minifigure driver. Control the Batmobile by downloading an app and using your smart device to drive and even do tricks!
This LEGO DC Super Heroes Batmobile building set brings home the incredible action of the cinematic DC Justice League film series and is compatible with all LEGO DC Super Heroes building toys.
This cool app-controlled car toy measures over 3” (9cm) high, 7” (19cm) long and 5” (13cm) wide.

Your child will love building the amazing app-controlled Batmobile toy and patrolling the streets of Gotham City with Batman! Set features Batman weapons, a Batman minifigure, and remote-control capabilities!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars286 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
